thread.title: Great hotel in London -
thread.title_full: Great hotel in London - Review of Premier Inn London Archway, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Some_Guy_in_Ang
title: Great hotel in London -
text:
In general, the standard for the majority of hotels in London (compared to the standard in the rest of "Western EU") is somewhat low... However, the Premier in at Archway is very good and beyond.
Rooms are clean, beds are fantastic... Hotel staff was helpful, the breakfast plentiful and offered a variety of items, and the dining room offered a very pleasant atmosphere.
Will likely stay here again the next time I am in the greater London area.
A major plus is that it is located directly next to the Archway tube station, and offers one of Londons best Curry restaurants just some 800ft way (The Sitara)...
